Interface GameActionInvoker

All Known Implementing Classes:
InputHandler
public interface GameActionInvoker
Interface for invoking game actions from commands. Provides methods for all basic game movements and actions.
See Also:
  • InputHandler
  • GameCommand

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    instantDrop()
    Instantly drops the brick to the bottom (hard drop).
    void
    moveDown()
    Moves the brick down using the default event source.
    void
    moveDown(EventSource source)
    Moves the brick down with a specified event source.
    void
    moveLeft()
    Moves the brick one cell to the left.
    void
    moveRight()
    Moves the brick one cell to the right.
    void
    rotate()
    Rotates the brick counterclockwise.

      Moves the brick down with a specified event source.

      source - the source of the move event (USER or THREAD)
